item.title: Open-source Software Pipeline
item.description: The following is a demonstration of the build pipeline I use for my personal projects. Creating a repository To start, I create a repository on Github. This whole process supports a ton of different languages, but I’m going to write a simple console app in Go. Checkout repository to local file system Go has a convenient command for checking out the repository and automatically putting it into the correct path in my GOPATH.
